Case 1: 0.000000% 50.000000% 50.000000%
Case 2: -nan% -nan% -nan%
Case 3: 50.000000% 50.000000% 0.000000%
Case 4: 100.000000%
Case 5: 0.000000% 0.000000% 100.000000%
